name: PTES Standard
description: Penetration Testing Execution Standard - 7 Phase Methodology

deliverables.title: Phase 1: Pre-engagement Interactions
deliverables.description: Scope definition, rules of engagement, and authorization documentation

deliverables.title: Phase 2: Intelligence Gathering
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM hosts

deliverables.title: Phase 3: Threat Modeling
deliverables.description: Identify assets, threats, and attack vectors based on gathered intelligence

deliverables.title: Phase 4: Vulnerability Analysis
deliverables.description: Identify and validate vulnerabilities in target systems
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings

deliverables.title: Phase 5: Exploitation
deliverables.description: Attempt to exploit identified vulnerabilities to gain access
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE severity IN ('critical', 'high')

deliverables.title: Phase 6: Post Exploitation
deliverables.description: Determine value of compromised systems and maintain control
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM credentials WHERE status = 'valid'

deliverables.title: Phase 7: Reporting
deliverables.description: Document findings, impact, and remediation recommendations
